short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts your selected text into charming chirp-style speech.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChirpTTS: A Fun and Engaging Text-to-Speech Experience

ChirpTTS is an accessibility extension that adds a touch of whimsy to your reading routine. Inspired by the charming sounds of characters from beloved games like Animal Crossing, ChirpTTS transforms written text into delightful chirps and tones.




Enhance your reading with ChirpTTS:


Text-to-Speech with a Twist: Convert any highlighted text on a webpage into a unique and entertaining audio experience.

Tailor Your Listening: Adjust the volume and pitch to suit your preferences and create a personalized soundscape for your reading.
Speed Up Your Reads: Activate quick reading mode to abbreviate words and fly through text passages efficiently.

Effortless Use: Simply select the text you want to hear spoken, right-click, and choose "Speak with ChirpTTS" from the context menu. ChirpTTS takes care of the rest.

Intuitive Interface: The user-friendly design of ChirpTTS ensures all features and settings are readily accessible, making it a breeze to navigate and customize your listening experience.


With ChirpTTS, reading becomes an interactive and enjoyable adventure!
